title: Has the detailed design been developed from the hardware item requirements and conceptual design data?
description: Has the detailed design been developed from the hardware item requirements and conceptual design data?

title: Has there been a detailed design review to demonstrate that it satisfies the custom device requirements, the conceptual design, and the hardware design standards?
description: Has there been a detailed design review to demonstrate that it satisfies the custom device requirements, the conceptual design, and the hardware design standards?

title: Does the detailed design data include all of the appropriate information such as assembly and interconnection data, component data, HDL code, test methods and the hardware-software interface?
description: Does the detailed design data include all of the appropriate information such as assembly and interconnection data, component data, HDL code, test methods and the hardware-software interface?

title: Have architectural design techniques been implemented as necessary, including establishing safety monitors for proper functionality, dissimilarity between function and safety monitors, preclusion of a design error from impacting safety, and fault tolerant designs?
description: Have architectural design techniques been implemented as necessary, including establishing safety monitors for proper functionality, dissimilarity between function and safety monitors, preclusion of a design error from impacting safety, and fault tolerant designs?

title: Have test features been designed in, where necessary, to allow verification of safety requirements?
description: Have test features been designed in, where necessary, to allow verification of safety requirements?

title: Has an assessment of unused functions been performed to identify potential effects on safety and have adverse effects  been addressed?
description: Has an assessment of unused functions been performed to identify potential effects on safety and have adverse effects  been addressed?

title: Have constraints on the design been identified, including installation or operation of the hardware item that, if not adhered to, could affect the safety of the item?
description: Have constraints on the design been identified, including installation or operation of the hardware item that, if not adhered to, could affect the safety of the item?

title: Have derived requirements produced during the detailed design process been fed back to the conceptual design or other appropriate process?
description: Have derived requirements produced during the detailed design process been fed back to the conceptual design or other appropriate process?

title: Does the detailed design data include all of the appropriate information such as assembly and interconnection data, component data, HDL code, test methods and the hardware-software interface?
description: Does the detailed design data include all of the appropriate information such as assembly and interconnection data, component data, HDL code, test methods and the hardware-software interface?

title: Have requirement omissions or errors discovered during the detailed design process  been provided to the appropriate processes for resolution?
description: Have requirement omissions or errors discovered during the detailed design process  been provided to the appropriate processes for resolution?

title: Does trace data include a correlation between the requirements and the hardware detailed design data?
description: Does trace data include a correlation between the requirements and the hardware detailed design data?

title: Have the planned transition criteria for entering the Hardware Implementation Process as identified in the PHAC and Hardware Development Plan been satisfied?
description: Have the planned transition criteria for entering the Hardware Implementation Process as identified in the PHAC and Hardware Development Plan been satisfied?
